dmca.title: Notice ID: 110-325767Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: scansoft-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:scansoft-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 09, 2005 12:03 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice ID: 110-325767Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Scansoft Property Notice ID:110-325767 Notice
Date:9 Dec 2005 17:51:39 GMT

Dear Sir or Madam:

ScanSoft and its affiliated companies (collectively, "ScanSoft") are the
exclusive owners of copyrights and other proprietary rights in numerous
software titles.
It has come to our attention that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is
the service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving,
file "swapping" or other similar activities) of ScanSoft's property(s)
listed below is taking place.  We believe that the Internet access of the
user engaging in this infringement is provided by ThePlanet.com Internet
Services, Inc. or a downstream service provider who purchases this
connectivity from ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..  

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act.  Depending upon
the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is providing to
this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not
expeditiously remove or disable access to the property(s) listed below, or
if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of
subscribers who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S.C. Sec. 512).

Despite the above, ScanSoft believes that the entire Internet community
benefits when these matters are resolved cooperatively.  We urge you to take
immediate action to stop this infringing activity and immediately inform us
of the results of your actions.  We appreciate your efforts toward this
common goal.  
Please reference the Notice ID number above in your response and direct all
correspondence through one of the two links below:
Email Replies:
mailto:scansoft@copyright-compliance.com?subject=RE%3A%20Notice%20ID%3A%2011
0%2D325767Copyright%20Infringement
Web Replies:
http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=110&commhash=215
c717d101ba6b53b814f254d060743

The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the property(s) in the
manner described herein is not authorized by ScanSoft, its agent or the law.
The information contained in this notification is accurate.  Under penalty
of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of ScanSoft with
respect to this matter.  Please be advised that this letter is not and is
not intended to be a complete statement of the facts or law as they may
pertain to this matter or of ScanSoft's positions, rights or remedies, legal
or equitable, all of which are specifically reserved.  

Regards,

Sarah Bergman
BayTSP, Inc. :: Compliance Manager
PO Box 1314  Los Gatos, CA 95031
ph: 408-341-2300  fax:  408-341-2399
email: ScanSoft@copyright-compliance.com *pgp public key is available on the
key server at ldap://keyserver.pgp.com


Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID:  325767
Asset:  Omnipage
Protocol:  eDonkey
IP Address:  67.19.205.244
DNS:  planet3a.hostaccino.com.au
File Name:  Scansoft Omnipage Pro v14.0 Office Multilanguage-Cygiso.bin File
Size:  635848704
Timestamp:  7 Dec 2005 05:19:58 GMT
Last Seen Date:  7 Dec 2005 05:19:58 GMT
URL:  ed2k://|file|Scansoft Omnipage Pro v14.0 Office
Multilanguage-Cygiso.bin|635848704|A7E09349EBA60688795BCEE62740F6F9|/
Username (if available):  HighID|1125371380|6928F1993DE7D20516FD1DD489213DBC
